name: quicksnip
title: QuickSnip
description: An open-source project that categorizes handy code snippets across various programming languages.
author: anders_morille

commands.name: find-snippet
commands.title: Find Snippet
commands.description: Find a code snippet using QuickSnip, then copy it to your clipboard or paste it directly into your application.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
